page.title: 07Home _life.
page.content: Owner occupiers of a cottage in the Parish of Pilleth with family had lived there ten years. they had moved from the town. Their house had electricity, mains water, six rooms, a bathroom and flushed toilet. They enjoyed the peace and quiet of the country side with plenty of room for the children to play and keep their pets. Neighbours are friendly and helpful. Children happy even if their friends live a mile away. It is under three miles to Knighton Primary School and they have to provide their own transport. Transport is provided to Whitton School. The Secondary Education is available eight miles away. Transport is provided. Shopping is done in Knighton with visits to Hereford for clothes and furniture.
